name: scan_table
description: Scan a DynamoDB table to retrieve all items or items matching filter conditions. Use sparingly on large tables as scans read entire table.

table_name.description: The name of the DynamoDB table to scan

filter_expression.description: Optional filter expression to apply to scan results (e.g., 'age > :val')

expression_attribute_values.description: Optional map of expression attribute values for filter expression (e.g., {':val': 25})

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (default: all items)
